```{r setup}
library(densityarea)
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggdensity)

data(s01)
```

```{r}
head(s01)
```

```{r}
s01 |> 
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = F2,
      y = F1
    )
  )+
    stat_hdr(probs = 0.1)+
    scale_y_reverse()+
    scale_x_reverse()
```

```{r}
density_area(s01$F1, s01$F2, probs = ppoints(40)) ->
  iso_poly
```

```{r}
s01 |> 
  reframe(
    area = density_area(log(F1), log(F2), probs = c(0.5, 0.6))
  ) |> 
  tidyr::unnest(area)
```
